paleoContext.name: Geologic Context
paleoContext.desc: Geologic context about the specimen, including information on the chronostratigraphy, lithostratigraphy, and tectonic setting

method.name: Method
method.desc: Method used to collect the specimen

startTime.name: Start Time
startTime.desc: Time, if known, that the collecting event started

endTime.name: End Time
endTime.desc: Time, if known, that the collecting event ended

verbatimDate.name: Verbatim Date
verbatimDate.desc: The verbatim date as recorded by the collector

collectingtrip.name: Collecting Trip
collectingtrip.desc: The collecting trip associated with the event. Each collecting trip may have multiple collecting events.

text10.name: Approved Formula
text10.desc: The approved chemical formula for a mineral.

text12.name: IMA No./Year
text12.desc: International Mineralogical Association number and year.

text13.name: Country
text13.desc: The country where the mineral was found.

text14.name: First Reference
text14.desc: The first reference for the mineral.

text15.name: Second Reference
text15.desc: The second reference for the mineral.

alternateName.name: Verbatim Name
alternateName.desc: The verbatim name of the specimen as recorded in the original source.

number1.name: Appraised Value
number1.desc: Current appraised value of the specimen
